name: Buffaloed
description: In the underworld of debt-collecting, homegrown hustler Peg Dahl will do anything to escape Buffalo, NY.

review.author: timothymstewart
review.heading: Started off Strong and Interesting
review.reviewBody: But like other reviewers have said, the plot just fell apart. This movie had some potential to be really clever and hit a home run, but it fell short of the mark. I thought Zoey Deutch did a great job. She is a great actress.

keywords: breaking the fourth wall,clogged toilet,scheme,woman in prison,revenge
